commentBody: So as I scrolled down, I kept wondering:  Would the writer have enough chutzpah to include the absolute implosion of the 2004 Yankees against their little brother, Red Sox Nation in the championship series?  I am sure that it does not good to the majority readership to put lemon juice on the fresh wound.  And I understand... we are all just a Bill Buckner or Bucky Dent away from heartache when it comes to our beloved teams.
